definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though

sentences.english: The accident took place at a power plant in Fengcheng where a cooling tower was under construction.
sentences.chinese: 事故发生在江西丰城一处电厂，正在修建一座冷却塔。

sentences.english: It has also destroyed the cooling tower at its reactor at Yongbyon.
sentences.chinese: 北韩还炸毁了宁边核反应堆的冷却塔。

sentences.english: Water-saving of counter-flow wet cooling tower is the key of water-saving work for the thermal power plant.
sentences.chinese: 逆流湿式冷却塔的节水是火力发电厂节水工作的关键。

sentences.english: North Korean officials also demolished the cooling tower at the country's Yongbyon nuclear reactor.
sentences.chinese: 另外，北韩还炸毁了宁边核设施的冷却塔。

sentences.english: These superwide tubes are called water-cooling towers.
sentences.chinese: 这些超宽的管道叫做水冷却塔。

sentences.english: For example I inhaled air and circulating water cooling tower .
sentences.chinese: 例如空气吸入口及循环水冷却塔等。

sentences.english: In cooler weather, a cooling tower may be used, permitting by-passing of the chillers.
sentences.chinese: 在冷天时，可以用冷却塔，而不需要通过制冷机。

sentences.english: A. the cooling tower physical cleaning and sterilizing alga.
sentences.chinese: 冷却塔的物理清洗及杀菌灭藻。

sentences.english: More than half the energy content of the fuel escapes from the power station's cooling tower as waste heat.
sentences.chinese: 多于一半的燃料能量作为废热从电厂的冷却塔逸出。

sentences.english: Antarctica is a great cooling tower for our planet, with ice more than two miles thick.
sentences.chinese: 南极是地球的重要天然冷却塔，冰层超过两英里厚。

sentences.english: The utility model belongs to the field of transverse flow direct contact water showering cooling towers.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型属于横流直接接触水淋冷却塔领域。

sentences.english: Normally, the towers inhale air to cool hot water from the reactors.
sentences.chinese: 通常说来，冷却塔吸入空气是为了冷却反应堆的沸水。

sentences.english: This 60-foot-tall cooling tower was destroyed earlier today.
sentences.chinese: 今天早些时候这座60英尺高度的冷却塔被炸毁。

sentences.english: The utility model is a cooling tower which is provided with the functions of anti-freeze and heat preservation.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型为具有防冻保温功能的冷却塔。

sentences.english: A hot water distribution basin can be adopted for the countercurrent closed cooling tower.
sentences.chinese: 本逆流闭式冷却塔可使用池式配水系统。

definition: fired power plant (i.e. fired by coal, oil or gas)
